responsibilities: Develop LLM applications to evaluate data quality and solve problems of synthetic data capabilities.
Execute business solutions using LLM applications.
Identify and exploit vulnerabilities in LLMs and other generative AI models.
Develop training materials for red teaming and adversarial analysis.
Conduct training sessions with operation staff.
Create data creation and vulnerability testing scripts in Python/TypeScript.
Collaborate with ML Engineers and software engineers for robust implementation and deployment.
Analyze and visualize experimental prompt results.
Develop and teach new prompt engineering methods to ML engineers and software engineering staff.
qualifications: Proficiency in writing Python or TypeScript for API-enabled scripts.
Ability to conduct analysis of model performance using statistics and data visualization.
Experience with frontier-scale LLMs (GPT, Claude, PaLM) for specific applications or implementations.
Familiarity with LLM evaluation metrics (BLUE, ROUGE, MAUVE, etc.) and statistics.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Creative mindset for experimentation and internal R&D.
analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills clearly indicate involvement with Generative AI and language models. The responsibilities include developing LLM applications, identifying vulnerabilities in LLMs and other generative AI models, and developing training materials for adversarial analysis, which are directly related to working with language models and generative AI. Additionally, the job requires collaboration with ML Engineers and software engineers, which suggests a focus on machine learning and AI technologies.

The skills section further supports this conclusion, as it mentions experience with frontier-scale LLMs (such as GPT, Claude, PaLM), familiarity with LLM evaluation metrics, and the ability to conduct analysis of model performance. These are all specific to working with language models and generative AI technologies.

Overall, both the responsibilities and skills are heavily centered around LLMs and generative AI, indicating that the job involves working with these technologies.
